articles.title: Japanese government categorically DENY report that the Tokyo Olympics 'are to be cancelled' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Japan's Deputy Chief Cabinet Secretary Manabu Sakai said there was 'absolutely no truth' in the report on Friday and said work is underway to establish countermeasures to Covid-19 in time.
articles.content:
Lord Coe has revealed Tokyo 2020 organisers now accept holding the Games behind closed doors after a day of denials over claims this summers event will be cancelled.
